description.en-us: The BIQU Panda Breeze is an auxiliary cooling fan designed for the Bambu Lab A1 3D printer. Mounted on the X-axis, its crossflow fan provides wide, even airflow across the print surface. This significantly improves print quality by enhancing bridging performance, stabilizing overhangs, and capturing fine details.
description.zh-cn: BIQU Panda Breeze 是专为 Bambu Lab A1 3D 打印机设计的辅助冷却风扇。它安装在 X 轴上，其横流风扇可在打印表面提供宽阔、均匀的气流。通过增强桥接性能、稳定悬垂和捕捉精细细节，可大大提高打印质量。
